text: Pretty rotten that the CDC blackballed me from interviews during a pandemic...no one at CDC or WH or anyplace else said my coronavirus reporting was factually wrong...people need to learn what is going on; this blackballing only exposed because of a FOIA request by someone https://t.co/tNwbDJ0oTS
